channel.title: Archived on 無極
channel.description: Recent content in Archived on 無極

item.title: Use Jupiter Notebook by ssh
item.description: This blog shows up a way to ssh a ubuntu computer (as Jupyter Notebook server) from mac. Prerequirements # Ubuntu / Remote Setting # SSH Setting # run the following command to enable the ssh on ubuntu(18.04) $ sudo apt-get install openssh-server Jupyter Notebook Setting(optional) # using jupyter notebook may require the token or password, you may refer to the jupyter notebook official site for details.

item.title: Rusty lake - Game Timeline & Secrets
item.description: Rusty Lake # Rusty lake is a thrilling game series with many secrets in them. Animal characters, shadow person, religious elements, murders… A thriller is too less to cover the topic of rusty lake, and what I am intent to do, is to reveal the prossible secrest hidden behind the screen… Cubes Collection # The Lake # The lake’s goal is to find the 5 objects:

item.title: New on Hugo🤺
item.description: Updated on 2021.09.16 My Steps to HUGO # Follow the official website basic installation; Find a great (better stable) theme at official theme library Config the config.yml or config.toml by instruction from the theme producer. something you may want to pay attention to # images # In hugos, the post use image from static folder, you can insert a image in a markdown method:

item.title: Note Learn Jekyll
item.description: Note of learning creating Blog in Jekyll Guide / Tutorial # For Jekyll # Quick Start - Official Tutorial Official one is the most basis and reliabel. What is Jekyll? and How it works? - Jekyll Bootstrap Better first go though the official one to understand what is Variables Front Matter .. Sinple guides of jekyll from CarlBoettiger Pure Guide, what do first, what next. Fast guide for those, who know html CloudCannon For HTML # No Base No Building: What is HTML / HTML5 und CSS Basic Knowledge in Mozilla Basic Example & Code Training HTML - W3School and JS -W3School Front Matter # --- title: Antigragile - Book Review layout: post author: Vac categories: [Book] tags: [Probability] --- Front Matter default # default your font matters in _config.

item.title: Personal GRE Summary
item.description: personal experience of gre. Verbal Reasoning # Good video suggested from Youtube: GRE Verbal Section Walkthrough: How I take the test (Part 1) 等號 強詞 逆向思維 浮動思維 Verbal Time Arrangement # word,2 min short essay :1.5:1 middle essay: 2.5:1 long essay: 4.5:1 閱讀 # 內容 3s 句子 段 篇 句間關系 同 反 but, yet,however,nevertheless 換對象 否定含義單詞 criticize, oppose, deny, reject
